Trigger You reduce your primary target to 0 Hit Points using @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Auto-Fire].

With a subtle gesture of your weapon and a stare, you remind a survivor of your onslaught that there's more where that came from. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Demoralize] a single creature that was in the area of your Auto-Fire; you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check. If you have legendary proficiency in Intimidation, or if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.class-features.Item.Action Hero] fighting style and the target of Collateral Witness is the enemy closest to you, you can use this as a free action with the same trigger.
